pages.text: $(l)Ancient Dwarven Mines$() stand as one of the last vestiges of a mighty and bygone civilization. $(br2)The entrance, found at ground level, swiftly plunges into the shadowy depths of the earth, where the rarest of resources, including the coveted $(l:resources/svartalfheim_steel)Svartalfheim Steel$(), were once fervently mined. $(br2)The true cause of the Dwarven civilizationâ€™s downfall remains shrouded in mystery, but legend speaks of their insatiable greed for treasure, which have awakened an ancient evil. Since that fateful time, the once bustling mines have lain abandoned, with their secrets left to the echoes of the past. $(br2)Now, these forsaken mines are fraught with peril. Dark creatures and ancient traps lie in wait for the unwary adventurer, making the quest for the secrets and riches within a dangerous endeavor.
Entrance to $(l)Dwarven Mines$(), which can be found in Taiga and Snowy Plains biomes
$(br)To aid in your quest, the $(l:entities/huldra_brothers)Huldra Brothers$() have invented a special $(l)Dwarven Compass$(), designed to guide you to the $(l)Ancient Dwarven Mines$().
